January 2023

Diwali Celebration: An exciting festival of lights with music, dance, and delicious food.

March 2023

Holi Festival: Celebrate colors and joy with an event full of music, fun, and more.

August 2023

Independence Day Parade: A grand parade with cultural performances to honor India's Independence.

October 2023

Navratri Festival: Experience the traditional dances of Garba and Dandiya during this nine-day celebration.

December 2023

New Year Gala: Ring in the New Year with a night of dancing, music, and festivities with the community.

February 2024

Vasant Panchami: Celebrate the arrival of spring with traditional music, dances, and a feast.
